product_summary: United Market is a platform that empowers musicians by providing them with AI-powered technology for collaboration, business management, and growth. It connects artists, music producers, A&R teams, managers, music supervisors, and content creators to create, promote, and monetize their music.
product_pros: Centralized platform for all music-related activities
Community of musicians and industry professionals
product_cons: May not be suitable for all music genres
Can be expensive for some users
Some features may require additional training
Limited integration with other music platforms
Can be competitive to get noticed on the platform

product_usecases.details: United Market allows artists and producers to collaborate on music projects from anywhere in the world. They can share ideas, tracks, and feedback in real-time, making the creative process more efficient and productive.
United Market provides tools for managing bookings, contracts, finances, and marketing campaigns. This helps musicians save time and focus on their music.
United Market offers opportunities for musicians to grow their audience, get their music heard by industry professionals, and build their careers.
United Market has a dedicated team that helps musicians get their music placed in TV shows, movies, and commercials. This can generate additional revenue and exposure for artists.
United Market provides a platform for musicians to connect with each other, industry professionals, and fans. This can lead to new collaborations, opportunities, and career growth.

product_toolfor.details: United Market is a valuable tool for artists of all levels, from emerging musicians to established professionals. It provides them with the resources and support they need to create, promote, and monetize their music.
United Market is a great platform for music producers to connect with artists, collaborate on projects, and get their beats heard. It also provides tools for managing their production business.
United Market can help A&R teams discover new talent, track artist trends, and manage their rosters. It provides a centralized platform for scouting, signing, and developing artists.
United Market can help managers manage their artists' careers, including bookings, contracts, finances, and marketing. It provides tools for tracking progress, setting goals, and staying organized.
United Market can help music supervisors find the perfect music for their projects. It provides access to a vast catalog of music, as well as tools for searching, filtering, and licensing tracks.

product_pricing: United Market offers a variety of pricing plans to suit different needs and budgets. Plans start at $9.99 per month and go up to $499.99 per month. There is also a free plan available with limited features.
